author: dims
msg: Added a default database based on HSQL Database Engine from http://sourceforge.net/projects/hsqldb/
To enable the database, download the HSQLDB.JAR from http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=23316 and place it in xml-cocoon\lib directory.

author: dims
msg: Externalized the database properties into a separate file
The build procedure will pick up the entries from this file and modify
